title: How to reach Diamond in minimal games.
body:
Diamond isn't really hard to obtain, theirs four core things you need to do! I'll explain these below.

Step 1) Buy RP, $25 will do.
Step 2) Purahcse the champion Lissandra.
Step 3) Buy one of her skins.
Step 4) play and abuse that freelo trash.

Enjoy free LP.
